docs.title: Welcome to Team Documentation
docs.text: This site contains guidelines, processes, and resources for our team.

docs.title: Quick Links
docs.text:
• Team Guidelines
  • About Our Team

For full documentation visit mkdocs.org.

docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

docs.title: About Our Team
docs.text: We are a talented group of professionals dedicated to creating amazing software.

docs.title: Communication
docs.text:
• Check email at least twice daily
  • Respond to Slack messages within 4 hours
  • Attend daily standup meetings

docs.title: Development Workflow
docs.text:
1. Create a branch for each feature
  2. Submit pull requests for review
  3. Ensure tests pass before merging
